channel.title: Blackscape script help!
channel.description: hi i use blackscape a simple little private hamatchi server however it has no npcs and i was wondering if any1 could help me add npcs or tell me how please and ty

item.title: Blackscape script help!
item.dc:creator: @redsox3334 redsox3334
item.description:
@redsox3334 wrote:

ok, so how do you actual implement the .cfg into the server coding? im new to this stuff but i know what im doing, so, maybe if you could point me in the right direction that would be a great help. BTW, im using the blackscape server also

Read full topic

item.title: Blackscape script help!
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

ok first you go into you autospawn.cfg

then you add the npc id and the cords you want it atâ€¦

for example it can look like this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 55 2910 9906 0 2912 9907 2907 9905 2 Blue dragon spawn = 78 2897 9910 0 2899 9912 2893 9905 2 Giant Bat spawn = 78 2894 9907 0 2899 9912 2893 9905 2 Giant Bat spawn = 78 2906 9912 0 2909 9914 2903 9911 2 Giant Bat spawn = 78 2917 9912 0 2918 9915 2906 9909 2 Giant Bat spawn = 78 2923 9910 0 2927 9911 2921 9910 2 Giant Bat spawn = 78 2934 9910 0 2939 9911 2930 9908 2 Giant Bat spawn = 78 2938 9904 0 2940 9905 2936 9903 2 Giant Bat

but there are spaces as you would see in your autospawn.cfg.

Read full topic
